entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
